mapper.select:
SELECT NA_BZPLC , AUC_OBJ_DSC , AUC_DT , QCN , BASE_LMT_AM , CUT_AM , SGNO_PRC_DSC , DDL_YN , TMS_YN , DEL_YN , FSRG_DTM , FSRGMN_ENO , LSCHG_DTM , LS_CMENO , MALE_KG , FEMALE_KG , TT_SCR FROM TB_LA_IS_MH_AUC_QCN WHERE 1 = 1
AND DATE_FORMAT(LSCHG_DTM, '%Y%m%d%H%i') >= DATE_FORMAT(date_add(NOW(), interval -10 minute), '%Y%m%d%H%i')
AND AUC_DT = #{aucDt}
AND AUC_DT >= DATE_FORMAT(date_add(NOW(), interval -7 day), '%Y%m%d')
ORDER BY LSCHG_DTM DESC, FSRG_DTM DESC

SELECT NA_BZPLC , AUC_OBJ_DSC , AUC_DT , RG_SQNO , ST_AUC_NO , ED_AUC_NO , SEL_STS_DSC , DEL_YN , FSRG_DTM , FSRGMN_ENO , LSCHG_DTM , LS_CMENO , DDL_QCN FROM TB_LA_IS_MH_AUC_STN WHERE 1 = 1
AND DATE_FORMAT(LSCHG_DTM, '%Y%m%d%H%i') >= DATE_FORMAT(date_add(NOW(), interval -10 minute), '%Y%m%d%H%i')
ORDER BY LSCHG_DTM DESC, FSRG_DTM DESC

SELECT NA_BZPLC , TRMN_AMNNO , MWMN_NA_TRPL_C , SRA_MWMNNM , FRLNO , ZIP , DONGUP , DONGBW , OHSE_TELNO , CUS_MPNO , MACO_YN , JRDWO_DSC , PSN_INF_OFR_AGR_YN , TMS_YN , DEL_YN , RMK_CNTN , CUS_RLNO , LSCHG_DTM , LS_CMENO , FSRG_DTM , FSRGMN_ENO FROM TB_LA_IS_MM_MWMN WHERE 1 = 1
AND DATE_FORMAT(LSCHG_DTM, '%Y%m%d%H%i') >= DATE_FORMAT(date_add(NOW(), interval -10 minute), '%Y%m%d%H%i')

SELECT NA_BZPLC , TRMN_AMNNO , RG_SQNO , RG_DT , SRA_MWMNNM , TELNO , FRLNO , NA_TRPL_C , TR_PMSS_YN , RG_BZPLNM , RGMNM , RGMN_TELNO , ACD_RG_RSNCTT , FSRG_DTM , FSRGMN_ENO , LSCHG_DTM , LS_CMENO FROM TB_LA_IS_MH_BAD_TRMN WHERE 1 = 1
AND DATE_FORMAT(LSCHG_DTM, '%Y%m%d%H%i') >= DATE_FORMAT(date_add(NOW(), interval -10 minute), '%Y%m%d%H%i')

SELECT NA_BZPLC , USRID , USRNM , PW , ENO , MPNO , STRG_YN , PWERR_NT , FSRG_DTM , FSRGMN_ENO , LSCHG_DTM , LS_CMENO FROM TB_LA_IS_MM_USR WHERE 1 = 1
AND DATE_FORMAT(LSCHG_DTM, '%Y%m%d%H%i') >= DATE_FORMAT(date_add(NOW(), interval -10 minute), '%Y%m%d%H%i')

SELECT NA_BZPLC , FHS_ID_NO , FARM_AMNNO , NA_TRPL_C , FTSNM , ZIP , DONGUP , DONGBW , OHSE_TELNO , CUS_MPNO , MACO_YN , RMK_CNTN , JRDWO_DSC , DEL_YN , ANW_YN , HDWK_RG_YN , SRA_FARM_ACNO , NEW_SRA_FARM_ACNO , SRA_FED_SPY_YN , BIRTH , FSRG_DTM , FSRGMN_ENO , LSCHG_DTM , LS_CMENO FROM TB_LA_IS_MM_FHS WHERE 1 = 1
AND DATE_FORMAT(LSCHG_DTM, '%Y%m%d%H%i') >= DATE_FORMAT(date_add(NOW(), interval -10 minute), '%Y%m%d%H%i')

SELECT NA_BZPLC , AUC_OBJ_DSC , AUC_DT , OSLP_NO , LED_SQNO , FHS_ID_NO , FARM_AMNNO , SOG_NA_TRPL_C , VHC_SHRT_C , RC_DT , TRMN_AMNNO , LVST_AUC_PTC_MN_NO , SRA_INDV_AMNNO , SRA_SRS_DSC , COW_SOG_WT , FIR_LOWS_SBID_LMT_AM , LOWS_SBID_LMT_AM , SRA_SBID_AM , SRA_SBID_UPR , SEL_STS_DSC , BRCL_ISP_CTFW_SMT_YN , BRCL_ISP_DT , LWPR_CHG_NT , VACN_DT , LVST_MKT_TRPL_AMNNO , MT12_OVR_YN , PPGCOW_FEE_DSC , PRNY_JUG_YN , PRNY_YN , NCSS_JUG_YN , NCSS_YN , TRPCS_PY_YN , SRA_TRPCS , SRA_PYIVA , SRA_FED_SPY_AM , TD_RC_CST , MT12_OVR_FEE , AFISM_MOD_DT , PRNY_MTCN , AFISM_MOD_CTFW_SMT_YN , RMHN_YN , SRA_PDMNM , SRA_PD_RGNNM , RMK_CNTN , AUC_PRG_SQ , TMS_YN , DEL_YN , AUC_YN , MOD_KPN_NO , DDL_QCN , SOGMN_C , FEE_CHK_YN , SELFEE_CHK_YN , FEE_CHK_YN_FEE , SELFEE_CHK_YN_FEE , BLOOD_AM , DNA_YN , BRANDNM , PDA_ID , DNA_YN_CHK , BOVINE_DT , RE_PRODUCT_1 , RE_PRODUCT_1_1 , RE_PRODUCT_2 , RE_PRODUCT_2_1 , RE_PRODUCT_3 , RE_PRODUCT_3_1 , RE_PRODUCT_4 , RE_PRODUCT_4_1 , EPD_YN , RE_PRODUCT_11 , RE_PRODUCT_11_1 , RE_PRODUCT_12 , RE_PRODUCT_12_1 , RE_PRODUCT_13 , RE_PRODUCT_13_1 , RE_PRODUCT_14 , RE_PRODUCT_14_1 , SPAY_YN , CASE_COW , FSRG_DTM , FSRGMN_ENO , LSCHG_DTM , LS_CMENO FROM TB_LA_IS_MH_SOG_COW WHERE 1 = 1
AND DATE_FORMAT(LSCHG_DTM, '%Y%m%d%H%i') >= DATE_FORMAT(date_add(NOW(), interval -10 minute), '%Y%m%d%H%i')
ORDER BY LSCHG_DTM DESC, FSRG_DTM DESC

SELECT NA_BZPLC , SRA_INDV_AMNNO , SRA_SRS_DSC , FHS_ID_NO , FARM_AMNNO , BIRTH , MCOW_DSC , KPN_NO , INDV_SEX_C , MCOW_SRA_INDV_AMNNO , MATIME , SRA_INDV_PASG_QCN , INDV_ID_NO , SRA_INDV_BRDSRA_RG_NO , RG_DSC , ANW_YN , FSRG_DTM , FSRGMN_ENO , LSCHG_DTM , LS_CMENO FROM TB_LA_IS_MM_INDV WHERE 1 = 1
AND DATE_FORMAT(LSCHG_DTM, '%Y%m%d%H%i') >= DATE_FORMAT(date_add(NOW(), interval -10 minute), '%Y%m%d%H%i')
ORDER BY LSCHG_DTM DESC, FSRG_DTM DESC

SELECT NA_BZPLC , AUC_OBJ_DSC , AUC_DT , QCN , BASE_LMT_AM , CUT_AM , SGNO_PRC_DSC , DDL_YN , TMS_YN , DEL_YN , MALE_KG , FEMALE_KG , TT_SCR , FSRG_DTM , FSRGMN_ENO , LSCHG_DTM , LS_CMENO FROM TB_LA_IS_MH_AUC_QCN WHERE AUC_DT = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d')
